body: Er.... this would have been hotter without the random actual sexual stuff

What the heck is 'buttfly' talking about? These aren't the same characters that are in "Oshikko Sesei. This story has men in it. I like it. It's a nice break from the lesbianism of the Oshikko stories. I like it.
I love every new story by Ogu.  This does need the "incest", "daughter" and "father" tags.

Although i love the art and the style, everything.. WHY A MAN?!?!
The best thing of your works was that innocent feeling, not taking advantage of that, but for the sake of the girls etc..
I think most of your fans ('cause i don't think it's just me) should(and will) overlook this. But DON'T BRING MEN TO THE STORY PLS...
PS:forgive if i used any spelling or grammar in a wrong way.
